description: Registry of recognized JSON Agents profile identifiers.

profiles.description: Base profile for agent identity, capabilities, tools, and modalities.
Execution profile describing runtime, entrypoint, and resource hints.
Governance profile for security, policies, and observability.
Graph profile for multi-agent compositions and routing.

notes.extensions: Additional profiles MAY be defined by separate documents using distinct IDs, e.g. 'realtime', 'evaluation', 'data-plane'.
